data.title: Lemongrass Cloud, SAP on Cloud, Managed Service Provider
data.meta_description: Lemongrass is a software-enabled services provider, synonymous with SAP on Cloud. Planning, Migration, Operation, and Innovation moving SAP on Cloud.
data.text:
Engineering the best SAP on Cloud experience for our customers.

Lemongrass Launches RISE with SAP Advisory Services

Lemongrass announced significant enhancements to its services portfolio by introducing new RISE with SAP Advisory offerings.

eBook: What Path Should You Take to SAP S/4HANA?

You need an approach that ensures a seamless transition to SAP S/4HANA, minus the headaches and hassles.

Our Recipe for Successful SAP Cloud Transformation

From business case creation, proof of concept, and everything else in between, we lay the foundation for success (on your terms) with an airtight plan.

With our outcome-focused methodology and experience of successfully migrating 8000+ enterprise SAP systems under our belt, you can migrate with confidence.

Post-migration, we ensure the optimal performance of your SAP systems while keeping costs low with our proactive support and automated solutions.

Hyperscale Cloud providers continue to innovate at a rapid pace. We help you leverage these innovations to implement new capabilities and maintain a competitive edge.

Why Choose Lemongrass

We eat, sleep, and breathe SAP on Hyperscale Cloud. To date, over 750k SAP users rely on our support.

One of the largest dedicated, credentialed SAP on Cloud teams in the world

Best SAP on Cloud automation platform in the industry

Extended SAP capabilities like Data Services, Automation, Application Archiving

A strong, experienced, flexible team that listens, challenges, and commits

SAP on Hyperscale Cloud is What We Do Best

Your business runs on SAP. Let us help take it where you need it to be with the agility and innovation of hyperscale Cloud.

Radisson Hotel Group, Lemongrass and AWS Partner to Deliver Cloud Transformation and Innovative Customer Experiences

Lemongrass announced that Radisson Hotel Group (RHG), one of the world’s leading hotel groups, has selected Lemongrass to migrate their entire SAP landscape to Amazon Web Services (AWS).

Lemongrass Qualified to Support RISE with SAP

Lemongrass received its qualification of Service Authorization for S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition in support of the RISE with SAP solutions. RISE with SAP brings together what businesses need to pursue their digital transformation objectives and accelerate their move to the Cloud while benefiting from the ability to begin their journey from their own unique starting point.

Infographic: Common Pitfalls to Avoid in Your SAP to Cloud Migration

Learn how you can be well-prepared to avoid pitfalls and ensure you get all the results and advantages you anticipate from your SAP to Cloud migration.

SAP on Cloud Discovery Workshop

The beginning of every transformation journey is packed with questions. Our SAP on Cloud Discovery Workshop will provide answers to all your questions and equip you with the tools and information you need to make the best decision regarding next steps on your SAP on Cloud journey.

Join Our Team

If you are looking for a career where you can impact, influence and advance next-generation trends with other forward-thinking SAP and Cloud technologists, then it’s time to consider a career at Lemongrass.
